Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
com.swiftfox.scheduler.Scheduler
Direct Known Subclasses:
FCFS, Priority, RR, SJF
public abstract class Scheduler extends Object
Abstract base class representing a CPU scheduler. Subclasses must implement specific scheduling strategies.

      Constructs a Scheduler with the specified ready queue.

  • Method Details

    • addProcess

      public void addProcess(Process process)
      Adds a process to the ready queue if it is in the READY state.
      Parameters:
      process - the process to add

    • decideNextProcess

      public abstract Process decideNextProcess()
      Determines the next process to run according to the scheduling policy.
      Returns:
      the next process to run, or null if none are available

    • onProcessCompleted

      public abstract void onProcessCompleted(Process process)
      Performs any actions required when a process completes execution. This might include updating internal state or removing the process from tracking.
      Parameters:
      process - the completed process
